page.title: Blowing the Whistle Can Bring Big Bucks (AP)
page.text: AP - Crime may not pay, but blowing the whistle on companies that swindle the government sure can. Jim Alderson got #36;20 million in one settlement and split #36;100 million with another whistleblower in a related case, both involving Medicare fraud by the nation's largest for-profit hospital chain and a company it acquired.
